Files Headings

SHA224.as
¶

* * SHA224 * * An ActionScript 3 implementation of Secure Hash Algorithm, SHA-224, as defined * in FIPS PUB 180-2 * Copyright (c) 2007 Henri Torgemane * * See LICENSE.txt for full license information.

 
package com.hurlant.crypto.hash
{
  public class SHA224 extends SHA256
  {
    function SHA224() {
      h = [
        0xc1059ed8, 0x367cd507, 0x3070dd17, 0xf70e5939,
        0xffc00b31, 0x68581511, 0x64f98fa7, 0xbefa4fa4
      ];
    }
    
    public override function getHashSize():uint {
      return 28;
    }
    public override function toString():String {
      return "sha224";
    }
  }
}
